# Report @ 2018/03/05 19:00 ## Trace * **[COLLECTOR]** Can't query any trace data. Graphsql service: ``` /api/trace ``` request parameters: ``` {"variables":{"condition":{"applicationId":"2","queryDuration":{"start":"2018-03-05 1856","end":"2018-03-05 1911","step":"MINUTE"},"paging":{"pageNum":1,"pageSize":10,"needTotal":true}}},"query":"\n query BasicTraces($condition: TraceQueryCondition) {\n queryBasicTraces(condition: $condition) {\n traces {\n key: segmentId\n operationName\n duration\n start\n isError\n traceIds\n }\n total\n }\n }\n"} ``` response body: ``` {"errors":[{"message":"Validation error of type FieldUndefined: Field 'segmentId' in type 'BasicTrace' is undefined"}]} ``` ## Topology * **[COLLECTOR]** The topology is incorrect in Kafka case. Screen snapshot: ## Application * **[COLLECTOR]** The topology is incorrect in Kafka case. Screen snapshot:

before 5.0.0 GA release, will has anthoer changes happend?

@cyberdak 5.0.0 GA is hard to say. It is a long way from here. The most important thing of merging this pr is only related to collector automatic tests.

Most things between 5.0.0 alpha -> GA are about optimization and end user experience.
No, it related to the implementation. Easy way is maybe happen on first several seconds, my guess 30-40seconds.
